name: external
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing External cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`external` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-external).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing External cloud resources.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-external)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-external` repo](https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-external/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-external` repo](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-external/issues).

python.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-external)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-external` repo](https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-external/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-external` repo](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-external/issues).

provider.description:
The provider type for the external package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getExternal.

query.description: A map of string values to pass to the external program as the query arguments. If not supplied, the program will receive an empty object as its input.

workingDir.description: Working directory of the program. If not supplied, the program will run in the current directory.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getExternal.

id.description: The id of the data source. This will always be set to `-`

query.description: A map of string values to pass to the external program as the query arguments. If not supplied, the program will receive an empty object as its input.

result.description: A map of string values returned from the external program.

workingDir.description: Working directory of the program. If not supplied, the program will run in the current directory.
